vn.map4d.map.core

Class Map4D

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map.core.Map4D

  • @UiThread
public final class Map4D
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the Map4D Android API and is the entry point for all methods related to the map. You cannot instantiate a Map4D object directly, rather, you must obtain one from the getMapAsync method on a MFMapView that you have added to your application. Map4D can only be read and modified from the Android UI thread. Calling Map4D methods from another thread will result in an exception.

        @NonNull
public MFCameraPosition getCameraPositionForBounds(MFCoordinateBounds bounds,
                                                             int padding)
        Get such that the specified latitude/longitude bounds are centered on screen at the greatest possible zoom level.
        Parameters:
        bounds - bounds
        padding - Padding for Left, Top, Right, Bottom added to the bounds
        Returns:
        Camera Position of bounds

                                                             int paddingBottom)

        paddingLeft - PaddingLeft added to the bounds
